Class CryptographyValidation

Namespace
OpenForge.Cryptography.LibOqs.Core
Assembly
OpenForge.Cryptography.LibOqs.Core.dll

Provides shared validation utilities for cryptographic operations. This class consolidates common validation logic used across KEM and signature implementations.

public static class CryptographyValidation

ValidateAlgorithmName(string?)

Validates that the algorithm name is not null, empty, or whitespace.

public static void ValidateAlgorithmName(string? algorithmName)

Parameters

algorithmName string

The algorithm name to validate.

Exceptions

ArgumentException

Thrown if algorithmName is null, empty, or whitespace.

ValidateAlgorithmSupport(bool, string)

Validates that the algorithm is supported and enabled.

public static void ValidateAlgorithmSupport(bool isSupported, string algorithmName)

Parameters

isSupported bool

Whether the algorithm is supported.

algorithmName string

The name of the algorithm.

Exceptions

NotSupportedException

Thrown if the algorithm is not supported or enabled.

ValidateContextStringSupport(bool, string)

Validates that a context string is supported by the algorithm.

public static void ValidateContextStringSupport(bool supportsContext, string algorithmName)

Parameters

supportsContext bool

Whether the algorithm supports context strings.

algorithmName string

The name of the algorithm.

Exceptions

NotSupportedException

Thrown if the algorithm doesn't support context strings.

ValidateNativeHandle(nint, string)

Validates that a native handle is not null (IntPtr.Zero).

public static void ValidateNativeHandle(nint handle, string algorithmName)

Parameters

handle nint

The native handle to validate.

algorithmName string

The name of the algorithm for error messages.

Exceptions

InvalidOperationException

Thrown if the handle is null.

ValidateNonNegativeIndex(int, string)

Validates that an index is non-negative.

public static void ValidateNonNegativeIndex(int index, string parameterName = "index")

Parameters

index int

The index to validate.

parameterName string

The name of the parameter for exception messages.

Exceptions

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

Thrown if the index is negative.

ValidateOperationResult(int, string, string, string?)

Validates that an operation result indicates success (typically 0 for liboqs).

public static void ValidateOperationResult(int result, string operationName, string algorithmName, string? additionalInfo = null)

Parameters

result int

The result code from the operation.

operationName string

The name of the operation for error messages.

algorithmName string

The name of the algorithm for error messages.

additionalInfo string

Additional information for error messages.

Exceptions

InvalidOperationException

Thrown if the operation failed.
